It comes with exceptional features and benefits that can significantly enhance your experience. I am offering it to you for $120. I believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product, and I hope you find it reasonable. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
